content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, I find the proposed apartment highly sought-after in its location. To secure such a prime property, I'd suggest a monthly rent of 1050 Euros. Max, if you're willing to accept this price, I agree to the price of 1050 Euro! However, if this amount is not within your budget, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm firmly committed to receiving the maximum possible rent. TERMINATE (if Max accepts the price) TERMINATE (if Max does not accept the price)
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
